JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: General application for Energy Engineering Consultancy Services, Denmark, UK - Aberdeen, PL - Gdynia
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Engineering Specialist for Consultancy Services

Are you eager to develop your career in the exciting energy industry?

Would you like to be in a dynamic company where you aren’t just a piece of the puzzle – but you do the puzzle? Then come join our Consultancy Service Team.

Your position

You will join our team of engineers and specialists dedicated to delivering our best support to our clients within the Energy Industry and helping them to achieve their goals.

“Joining our team means not only being part of an exciting project but also shaping its success. As we establish our new Consultancy Services department, your expertise will be instrumental in setting the standards and making a tangible impact on our journey towards driving real change,” says Bo Jespersen, Senior Manager, Consultancy Services.

The set-up

Your place of work will be either at our Global HQ located in Esbjerg or at one of our locations in Denmark, Norway, Poland or UK.

You will be hired on a full-time contract and work in a team dedicated to one of our national or international customers.

All our positions are onshore, and some travel activities can be expected, both between our locations and visits to our customers.

Your role in the team
We are currently looking for candidates with expertise and competences with one or more of the following disciplines:

We have opportunities as / within:

Completion engineering

Commissioning Engineer

Cyber Security engineering

Electrical Engineer

High Voltage (HV) engineering

Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE)

Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) engineering

Mechanical & Piping Engineer

Planner and Planning

Safety and Automation Systems (SAS) engineering

Structural Engineer

The tasks will depend on the specific client's needs and the specific projects.

Your profile & qualifications

We are looking for experienced and result-driven candidates who want to develop their career while delivering an excellent service to our customers. We need candidates with a problem-solving approach with a proactive mindset and good organized skills, who are passionate about interdisciplinary collaboration and project delivery.

To succeed in our team, we imagine that you have:

  • A bachelor’s or master’s degree in engineering.
  • 3+ years of experience within the Energy Sector.
  • Good communication skills.
  • Experience with large and midsize projects.
  • Experience from consultancy companies will be preferred.
  • A good team player with cross-cultural skills and proactive mindset.
  • Excellent stakeholder management.
  • Experience with working with Scandinavian stakeholders will be a plus for all the positions.
  • Knowledge of Industry standards for example from the Oil & Gas Industry or Wind Industry.
  • Excellent verbal and written English communication skills at a professional level.


We are currently seeking candidates located exclusively in Denmark, Norway, Poland and UK; applicants from other locations will not be considered.

Procedure

Interviews will be conducted on an ongoing basis to meet client needs. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact: Maria Anglada Meza at +45 3016 6762

Apply:
https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/general-application-for-energy-engineering-consultancy-services/fik162/en

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company with 2,400 employees and 40 years of dedication rooted in both the conventional energy sector and the offshore wind industry. This puts us in a unique position to bridge today's and tomorrow’s solutions, constantly seeking clever and pragmatic ways to realise global energy ambitions. We do this through comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects together with world-leading partners across the globe.
